channel.title: eindhoven on Chaire de Design Jean Prouvé
channel.description: Recent content in eindhoven on Chaire de Design Jean Prouvé

item.title: Home
item.description: The Chair of Design Jean Prouvé is a benevolent place dedicated to the development of design practice and research. It is committed to a programme combining research, teaching and design projects, with the aim of social transformation through everyday practices.
